attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the new 20 pound note is so bad it looks like toy monney and why in the name of england does it have a euro sign on it there is no way id like to see the euro try to sneak its way into this country, replace the new note or bring back the old one!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
